price: 40. Oh Nkolo wa ngai! Sala ngai ete nakokisa basambela elongo na libota nangai, Nkolo wa biso ndima libondeli na biso.
arabic: رَبِّ ٱجۡعَلۡنِي مُقِيمَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَمِن ذُرِّيَّتِيۚ رَبَّنَا وَتَقَبَّلۡ دُعَآءِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: rabbi ij'ʿalnī muqīma al-ṣalati wamin dhurriyyatī rabbanā wataqabbal duʿāi
